front.title: Draft IEEE Standard Systems and Software Engineering-Guide for Life Cycle Processes

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This Technical Report is a guide for the life cycle management of systems and software based on ISO/IEC 15288 and ISO/IEC 12207. This guide addresses systems concepts and life cycle concepts, models, stages, processes, process application, key points of view, adaptation and use in various domains.
